enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Communication Studies Majors only
title: SoC COMM_ST 294-0-22 First-Year Seminar

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Communication technology is an integral part of our daily lives. This seminar examines how we live with communication technology: how we understand the properties of mobile and web-based technologies; the myriad contexts in which we make use of communication technologies; and how we use technology to form, manage, and negotiate a variety of relationships throughout the lifespan. Writing assignments will focus on analyzing students' own and other people's interaction with communication technology.

subject: COMM_ST
